t: Amazon stock plan for US employees
s: As an Amazon US employee, you can choose Fidelity as the broker for your restricted stock units (RSUs). Learn how Fidelity's expertise and online tools can help you better manage your RSUs.

t: Getting started with your Amazon stock plan: US employees
s: Customize your Amazon stock plan account at Fidelity. Manage your money, learn how to set up electronic funds transfers (EFTs), add account beneficiaries, and manage your accounts. You can also do all this with the Fidelity app.

t: Fidelity Stock Plan Services | Amazon Stock Plan | Getting started
s: If you haven’t already, go to the Amazon Stock portal and select Fidelity. We’ll guide you through opening your stock plan account* so you can easily view and manage your award. Use our step-by-step guide (PDF) to open your account. *If you have Amazon stock already at Morgan Stanley it ...

t: Fidelity Stock Plan Services | Amazon Stock Plan | Why Fidelity
s: Fidelity Stock Plan Services (Fidelity) gives you one clear, comprehensive view of your outstanding awards, shares, and cash. ... From our intuitive website to our multilingual representatives, we make it simple. Learn more about: 1. Getting started 2. Accessing your Amazon stock

t: Fidelity Investments - App on Amazon Appstore
s: Invest at a firm invested in you. Fidelity’s secure and easy-to-use award-winning app gives you access to a broad choice of investments, expert insights, and investing tools—helping you make smart decisions with your money.
